name: Bloomyth
description:
A father, a son and their faith in a myth. Bloomyth is a puzzle and adventure video game in which you will enter the search for the last hope to save a life. Explore and stay alert along the way, overcome obstacles, solve puzzles and... Watch out for time, there is no turning back!.

-Find out the truth behind the Bloomyth
-Overcome the obstacles correctly to reach the temple on time
-Enjoy the relaxing theme
-Focus and solve the puzzles
-Get both endings of the game
